mapper.insert: insert into t_book(barcode, bookName, bookType, price, count, publishDate, publish, introduction, bookPhoto) values(#{barcode},#{bookName},#{bookType},#{price},#{count},#{publishDate},#{publish},#{introduction},#{bookPhoto})
mapper.update: update t_book set user_name=#{userName},user_age=#{age} where user_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select barcode, bookName, bookTypeName, price, count, publishDate, publish, bookPhoto from t_book inner join t_booktype on bookType=bookTypeId order by barcode asc

select barcode, bookName, bookTypeName, price, count, publishDate, publish, bookPhoto from t_book inner join t_booktype on bookType=bookTypeId
barcode like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{barcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND bookName like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{bookName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND bookType = #{bookType, jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND publishDate like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{publishDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
order by barcode asc
